articles.title: Prevalence of persistent SARS-CoV-2 in a large community surveillance study - Nature.com
articles.description: Using viral sequence data, individuals with persistent SARS-CoV-2 infections were identified, and had higher odds of self-reporting long COVID, in a large community surveillance study.
